alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Emanuel; Laurens; Montgomery; Telfair; Toombs; Treutlen; Wheeler; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Laurens, south central Emanuel, southeastern Dodge, Toombs, Telfair, southeastern Treutlen, southeastern Wilcox, Wheeler and Montgomery Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 330 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Cobbtown to near Alamo to Bowens Mill, and moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McRae, Lyons, Alamo, Mount Vernon, Vidalia, Helena, Lumber City, Glenwood, Milan, Uvalda, Oak Park, Ailey, Scotland, Higgston, Santa Claus, Alston, Jacksonville, Tarrytown, Towns and Ohoopee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Dodge; Emanuel; Laurens; Montgomery; Telfair; Toombs; Treutlen; Wheeler; Wilcox
